resources.string: Your total calories intake from yesterday was:

Author: Shu Chen

Fragments will show in yellow background.

This activity also support a chinese version.

Three Toolbar Items:

1. Calculate average calories eaten per day.

2: Calculate total calories eaten by day.

3: Instruction about this activity.

To review or edit nutrition details: click any records on display view.

To add a food item: click Add A Food Item button on the bottom.

Find out more details by clicking floating action button in fragment.

To store or update nutrition details:

 1. Please fill out all empty fields.

 2. Food Item field must and only contain letters.

 3. Fields for Calories, Fat and Carbohydrate are numbers only.

Information will store into a database and can be used for calculation and future analysis purposes.

Click Delete button to delete current existing data.

Cancel button allows you to go back to previous activity without saving.
Do you want to delete duplicate?
Entry added to the list successfully
Please change or delete Thermostat Rule
Thermostat Activity V2.0 by Nikolay Melnik

You can program the thermostat by 
 adding the new rules or deleting/updating
 the old ones.
 Please press "Add new Rule" button
 to add new rule, or click on the List
 to update/delete an old one.
 In the next activity you can change
 individual parameters by clicking on them\ nor by choosing different options.
 After you are satisfied with your choice
 please click proper button for operation
 and you will return back to this screen
 where you will see the changes.
 If you enter a duplicate entry, you will
 be asked to confirm your choice by an Alert
 window.

Huaming Cai - Activity Tracker
Shu Chen - Food Nutrition Tracker
Nikolay Melnik - Thermostat
Jinda Xu - Automobile Activity"
You are about to delete the Rule. Do you want to proceed?
